technologies.name: Docker
technologies.rationale: Standard for application packaging and deployment across all teams.

technologies.name: Serverless Framework
technologies.rationale: Showing promise for event-driven workloads. Evaluating cost and performance characteristics.

technologies.name: Terraform
technologies.rationale: Standardized across all cloud deployments. Mature tooling and strong community.

technologies.name: Pulumi
technologies.description: Modern Infrastructure as Code using familiar programming languages

technologies.name: Ansible
technologies.rationale: Evaluating for configuration management needs. Comparing with cloud-native alternatives.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.rationale: Standard for all new JavaScript projects. Significantly improves code quality and maintainability.

technologies.name: Rust
technologies.description: Systems programming language focusing on safety and performance
technologies.rationale: Promising for high-performance components. Small team experimenting with game engine components.

technologies.name: Microservices Architecture
technologies.description: Architectural pattern for building scalable, distributed applications
technologies.rationale: Proven approach for our scale. Well-understood patterns and tooling available.

technologies.name: Event Sourcing

technologies.rationale: Valuable for audit trails and complex domain models. Evaluating complexity vs. benefits.
